definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Francis Bacon (1561-1626), English Renaissance philosopher and early scientist
pinyin: Fu2 lan2 xi1 si1 · Pei2 gen1

sentences.english: She touched his arm and called him ‘Francis’.
sentences.chinese: 她摸着他的胳膊，叫他“弗蘭西斯”。

sentences.english: It is proposed by the Italian monk St Francis in 12th century.
sentences.chinese: 它是由意大利修道士聖弗蘭西斯在十二世紀提出的。
